name: Dancing Block
description:
Dancing Block is a self-develop rhythm game. The game is an imitation and a salute to another rhythm game "Dancing Line" produced by Cheetah Mobile. In the game, players are expected to control the direction of an ever-growing line to avoid obstacles by the music rhythm and beats. 

So far, the game incorporates 7+ levels, and the songs of which include well-known music such as Better Days by OneRepublic, Children of the Miracle by Don Diablo, and The Nights by Avicii. There are also other game modes as well, such as the Endless Challenges, which includes another 20+ songs.
